attributes.action: shut down the petitions website because it's useless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All that happens here when a petition is made is a response which says "we're just going to ignore you and do it anyway". Stop deceiving the public by pretending that petitions do anything at all.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
